about_the_game:
A moon is falling towards our outpost!

You have been left alone. Your only tools are your trusty jetpack and your item spawner. But your spawner has malfunctioned and will only spawn random items! You must ascend the tower to fix your tool and defend your outpost from the approaching danger!

In this randomized platform spawner game, you aim to ascend Corin tower before the approaching danger reaches you. Corin tower features 9,500+ spawnable objects to help your ascent as you attempt to reach the top before the rogue moon collides with the settlement.

It also features seasonal tower climbs!

Currently available seasonal towers are:
  • Spooky Tower consists of over 400+ spooky-themed spawnable items that will assist you in ascending the tower before the Accretion Spider Queen and her brood invade your outpost!

  • Yule Tower consists of over 350+ winter-themed spawnable items that will assist you in ascending the tower before the frozen snowball of the Frost Giants destroys it!

Every tower features a casual mode if you'd rather enjoy a more chill experience and ascend the tower(s) casually without the timed threat of destruction.

Good luck, and have fun!

name: Corin Tower

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 Home
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700K CPU @ 3.60GHz 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 Home
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700K CPU @ 3.60GHz 3.60 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A moon is falling towards our outpost! You have been left alone. Your only tools are your trusty jetpack and your item spawner. But your spawner has malfunctioned and will only spawn random items! You must ascend the tower to fix your tool and destroy the approaching danger!
